description:
Property Description
Exceptional R4 Corner Site with Boarding House / Co-Living/ NDIS Potential (STCA)
A rare and highly strategic opportunity in the heart of Hurstville South. Set on an impressive 800 sqm* corner parcel with wide dual street frontages, this property offers outstanding development versatility and is ideally suited for a high-yield boarding house, co-living residence or specialist disability accommodation subject to council approval (STCA).
Key Features:
Large 800 sqm* corner
Read more
